name: Chess·
description:
Chess by Solitaire Games Free is the best New chess game on the App Store!

Challenge your friends to a classic game of chess or play against the computer. Can you beat all the levels of difficulty?

Features of Chess:
- Play UNLIMITED free games
- Challenge the AI or a friend
- AI has multiple levels of difficulty
- Save game progress and continue later
- Pass-and-play against friends with option to flip board every move
